mapper.update:
update jcb..b_income_record
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
prod_id = #{prodId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bid_id = #{bidId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bid_money = #{bidMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
income_date = #{incomeDate,jdbcType=DATE},
income_money = #{incomeMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
income_status = #{incomeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update jcb..b_income_record set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prod_id = #{prodId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bid_id = #{bidId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bid_money = #{bidMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, income_date = #{incomeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, income_money = #{incomeMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, income_status = #{incomeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select bir.id as id,bpr.product_name as projectName,bir.income_date as expireDate,bir.income_money as incomeMoney from b_income_record bir join b_product_record bpr on bir.prod_id=bpr.id where bir.uid=#{userId} order by bir.income_date

SELECT
FROM b_income_record WHERE income_status = 0 AND income_date = #{expiredDate}
